us-bibliographic-data-application.invention-title: Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart

abstract.p: A Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart is disclosed within, wherein laundry is placed when extracted from the washing machine and dryer, respectively. Wherein the canvas hamper is attached to the shopping cart with flaps extending from the panels over the top periphery of the shopping cart and secure to the outer side of each of the panel, to be secured with buttons through buttonholes, midway from the top and inside the shopping cart, the canvas hamper ends, and at the four lower corners of the canvas hamper are fashion ropes looped through grommet/eyelets to be secure inside the shopping cart.

description.heading: DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE INVENTION
description.p: The present invention is described in the following examples, which may represent more than one embodiment of the present invention.

In reference to drawings as shown in FIG. 1, is the complete view 100, of the Canvas Laundromat Hamper in the shopping cart, the Canvas Laundromat Hamper has five panels sewn together and form an opening 200 at the top for access, made in accordance with the present invention, which has a front panel 100a, that extend to the top periphery and form a natural fold that goes over the outside to form a flap 110a that secures the hamper to the shopping cart with buttons 102, through buttonholes 103.

description-of-drawings.p: A left panel 100d that is extended to form a natural fold that goes over the top periphery to the outer side to form a flap 110d, that secures to the shopping cart with buttons 102 going through buttonholes 103, a bottom panel 100e, forms the base of the hamper, which ends midway from the top of the shopping cart. At the bottom corners at each end of each side panel from 100a-100d, twisted beige color fashion rope 105 going through gold color grommet/eyelets104/104a, 104 male, 104a female spurs studs.

FIG. 2 Shows the top view of the canvas hamper 100, outside of the shopping cart with an opening 200 at the top canvas hamper, with visible panels 100a-100d that folds/flaps110a-110d opened, and two sides with notches visible 108, 109, lift side 109 notch and right side 108 notch which is the allowance for the handle of the cart and the sides left 108 and right 109 with buttonholes 103.

FIG. 3 is a fragmented view of the Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart 100, showing the elevated view of lining shown by dotted lines 101, and the view of the five panels 100a-100e separated including lining shown dotted lines 101a-101e which is identical to the main panels 100a-100e before sewn together, the back panel lining shown elevated dotted lines 101b has a pocket 106 sewn in with a zipper 107 for access.

description.p: The left panel 100d/101d has a notch 108 left side, to accommodate the handle of the shopping cart, the right panel 100c/101c has a notch 109 right side to accommodate the handle of the shopping cart. Each lower corner has gold color grommet/eyelets 104 male, 104a female, male/female parts 104/104a. a pocket 106, with zipper 107, beige color fashion rope 105, brown buttons 102, and buttonholes 103.

The embodiments thereof illustrated in the accompanying Figures and/or described herein are merely exemplary and are not meant to limit the scope of the invention. It is to be appreciated that the invention has been contemplated as would be obvious to one of ordinary skill in the art with the benefit of this disclosure. Rather, the scope and breadth afforded this document should only be limited by the claims provided herein while applying either the plain meaning to each of the terms and phrases in the claims or the meaning clearly and unambiguously provided in this specification.

claim.claim-text: 1. A Canvas Laundromat Hamper for shopping Cart comprising;a. Vertical rectangle enclosure having an opening at the top peripheryb. Front and rear panels, right and left panels and a bottom panel.c. Having four flaps that is continues from the four side panels going over the top periphery.d. Flaps secure to the outer walls of the four side panels with buttons.e. The four bottom corners are punched with spur grommets/eyelets.f. twisted fashion rope to go through grommet/eyelets, to secure canvas hamper inside, at midway from the top, inside the shopping cart.g. a pocket for dryer sheets sewn into the lining of the back panel.h. The Canvas hamper extend only midway inside the shopping cart for comfort.
2. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1, wherein the hamper is made from canvas fabric that is Foldable, washable and dryer safe.

3. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for shopping Cart according to claim 1, wherein it is private use for each user and prevent user putting their clean clothes into a dirty laundromat hamper someone just dumped in their dirty laundry.
4. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1, wherein hamper contains a pocket with zipper access inside the back panel.
5. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1a, vertical rectangle enclosure with opening at the top periphery for receiving laundry from washing machine and dryer, respectively.
6. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1b, wherein five panels are sewn together to make the laundry hamper.
7. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1c, each panel is extended over the top periphery to form flaps over the outer sides of the shopping cart.

8. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1d, flaps are secured to the outside of the panels with brown color buttons through buttonholes or can also be secured with Velcro squares.
9. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for shopping Cart according to claim 1e, the four bottom corners are punched with gold color spur grommet/eyelets.
10. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1f, twisted beige color fashion rope ties the four corners at the end of the hamper to shopping cart.
11. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1g, a pocket sewn into the lining back panel for dryer sheets are whatever deems necessary.

12. Canvas Laundromat Hamper for Shopping Cart according to claim 1h, Hamper extend only midway in shopping cart interior, to meet the approximate height and size of a regular Laundromat hamper, this eliminated reaching to floor of the shopping cart to retrieve laundry.
